response.original_title: Mexico's Door: The Center of America's Border Fight
response.overview: With record-high border crossings and tensions brewing, The Daily Wire sent reporter Kassy Akiva down to Eagle Pass, TX–also known as "Mexico's Door"–to see the situation up close. Get a raw look at the gateway for illegal migration into America and see the impact this crisis has on everyday Americans.
response.tagline: The Center of America's Border Fight
response.title: Mexico's Door: The Center of America's Border Fight
